purpose: Facilitate deep research and analysis by processing and reasoning over extensive web data
principle: Utilizes AI techniques to analyze and synthesize large volumes of web data for research purposes
reusability: Designed to be integrated with data extraction tools like Firecrawl, offering extensibility for custom research applications
limitations: Primarily focused on web data; may require significant computational resources for large datasets
name: open-deep-research
description: An open source deep research clone. AI Agent that reasons large amounts of web data extracted with Firecrawl
highlight: AI agent capable of reasoning over large datasets extracted from the web using Firecrawl
